unnormalised: The much-anticipated wedding of Priya Sharma and Rohan Verma took place on 12/12/2024 at the Grand Imperial Hotel, located at 123, MG Road, Bangalore, 560001. Guests from across India and abroad gathered to celebrate the union of the two families. The venue, known for its sprawling lawns and ornate ballrooms, was chosen for its capacity to accommodate the 500+ invitees and its convenient location in the heart of the city.
normalised: The much-anticipated wedding of Priya Sharma and Rohan Verma took place on twelfth december two thousand and twenty four at the Grand Imperial Hotel, located at one hundred and twenty three, M-G Road, Bangalore, five hundred and sixty thousand and one. Guests from across India and abroad gathered to celebrate the union of the two families. The venue, known for its sprawling lawns and ornate ballrooms, was chosen for its capacity to accommodate the five hundred plus invitees and its convenient location in the heart of the city.

unnormalised: The wedding festivities spanned three days, starting with a traditional Mehendi ceremony at the Sharma residence at 45, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, 400050. This was followed by the Sangeet at the hotel's banquet hall, which was transformed into a Bollywood-themed extravaganza. The wedding ceremony itself took place under a beautifully decorated mandap on the hotel's main lawn.
normalised: The wedding festivities spanned three days, starting with a traditional Mehendi ceremony at the Sharma residence at forty five, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty. This was followed by the Sangeet at the hotel's banquet hall, which was transformed into a Bollywood-themed extravaganza. The wedding ceremony itself took place under a beautifully decorated mandap on the hotel's main lawn.

unnormalised: Post-wedding celebrations are planned at the Verma family's ancestral home, situated at 78, Civil Lines, Allahabad, UP, 211001. The couple is expected to reside primarily in Mumbai, with Priya continuing her work as a software engineer and Rohan managing his family business. The families expressed their gratitude to all those who attended and made the wedding a memorable occasion.
normalised: Post-wedding celebrations are planned at the Verma family's ancestral home, situated at seventy eight, Civil Lines, Allahabad, U-P, two hundred and eleven thousand and one. The couple is expected to reside primarily in Mumbai, with Priya continuing her work as a software engineer and Rohan managing his family business.
